query.statement: INSERT INTO TB_EXT_CATEGORY (CATEGORY_NO, CATEGORY_NAME, CATEGORY_DESC, USE_YN, REG_ID, REG_DATE, MODIFY_ID, MODIFY_DATE) VALUES (:vo.categoryNo, :vo.categoryName, :vo.categoryDesc, :vo.useYn, :vo.regId, sysdate, :vo.regId, sysdate)
